Login for more options

Title

Bug 75926:(Watson Migration Closure)ER for: arrayCollapse()

Description

Problem:

ER for: arrayCollapse(). This would allow removing undefined elements from an array. As noted by Elliott: "We really should have a function to collapse an array removing all undefined elements too. The listToArray(arrayToList()) way only works if you have simple values."

Related thread: https://prerelease.adobe.com/r/?4b9c4663d0f24d11bcf366e80bd114d4

If listToArray(arrayToList()) always worked, then it would be rated '4 - Important(Easy workaround, should be fixed)'

However, that is not the case. So, this is rated '3 - High(Has workaround difficult to implement)'
Method:


Result:

Test Configuration
